Introduction
This topic contains information on Classes II(a) and II(c) dental outpatient service, including
eligibility and levels of outpatient service for Class II(a) and II(c) dental conditions
, and
automatic eligibility for Class II(c) dental treatment
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - Overview of Classes of Eligibility for Dental Treatment
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A
